Pre-Game Insights: The T20 World Cup 2024 starts on 1 June with a match between co-hosts USA and Canada at the Grand Prairie Stadium in Texas.
The T20 World Cup 2024 is set to be the biggest and grandest of all with 20 teams in total including nine associate teams.
The first match between USA and Canada will be played at 7.30 PM local time on 1 June which will be 6 AM on 2 June in India.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The T20 World Cup 2024 will be hosted in the USA and West Indies.
The USA will be hosting an ICC event for the first time at: Nassau County International Cricket Stadium (New York), Grand Prairie Cricket Stadium (Dallas) and Broward County Stadium (Lauderhill).
